```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
library(rphydro)
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
library(reshape2)
```
## Parameters

Carbon allocation was 0 for fertalised, 0.2 for unfertalised (Fransson 2024)
Original jmax = 86.02379

So set a_jmax as 800 to get the equlibrium point around 80 as an original.

Nitrogen leaf content upper limit is limited by the nitrogen store in the leaf!

```{r}
kphio = 0.087;        # quantum yield efficiency
ppfd = 300;          # umol/m2/s
ppfd_max = 1200;
vpd  = 1000;         # Pa
co2  = 400;          # ppm
elv  = 0;            # m.a.s.l.
fapar = 0.7;         # fraction
rdark = 0.015;
tc = 25;
vwind = 3;
netrad = ppfd/2
psi_soil = -0.05
pa = calc_patm(elv)

### New parameters TODO: justify these!
a_jmax = 8000

par_cost = list(alpha=0.1, gamma=1, carbon_allocation = 1);
par_plant = list(conductivity=3e-17, psi50=-2, b=2);
options = list(gs_method = "GS_IGF", 
               et_method = "ET_DIFFUSION",
               ftemp_vj_method = "FV_kumarathunge19",
               ftemp_rd_method = "FR_heskel16",
               ftemp_br_method = "FB_atkin15",
               scale_alpha = F)
```


## Acclimating (Weekly) Response

```{r}
nitrogen = 0.02 # TODO: is this too high as it is a dry weight value?
dat_0.02 = tibble(ppfd = seq(1,1200,length.out=50)) %>% mutate(dat = purrr::map(.x=ppfd, .f = ~rphydro_nitrogen(tc, tc, .x, netrad, vpd, co2, pa, nitrogen, fapar, kphio, psi_soil, rdark, vwind, a_jmax, par_plant, par_cost, options))) %>% unnest_wider(dat)

nitrogen = 0.005
dat_0.005 = tibble(ppfd = seq(1,1200,length.out=50)) %>% mutate(dat = purrr::map(.x=ppfd, .f = ~rphydro_nitrogen(tc, tc, .x, netrad, vpd, co2, pa, nitrogen, fapar, kphio, psi_soil, rdark, vwind, a_jmax, par_plant, par_cost, options))) %>% unnest_wider(dat)

dat_original = tibble(ppfd = seq(1,1200,length.out=50)) %>% mutate(dat = purrr::map(.x=ppfd, .f = ~rphydro_numerical(tc, tc, .x, netrad, vpd, co2, pa, fapar, kphio, psi_soil, rdark, vwind, par_plant, par_cost, options))) %>% unnest_wider(dat)
```

```{r}
df_0.02.m <- dat_0.02 %>% melt("ppfd")
df_0.005.m <- dat_0.005 %>% melt("ppfd")
df_original.m <- dat_original %>% melt("ppfd")

ggplot() + 
  geom_line(data = df_original.m, aes(y = value, x = ppfd, color = "Numeric")) +
  geom_line(data = df_0.005.m, aes(y = value, x = ppfd, color = "N Included 0.5%")) +
  geom_line(data = df_0.02.m, aes(y = value, x = ppfd, color = "N Included 2%")) +
  scale_color_manual(values = c("N Included 2%" = "blue", "N Included 0.5%" = "aquamarine4", "Numeric" = "red")) +
  theme_classic() +
  theme(strip.background = element_rect(color = "white", size = 1),
        legend.title = element_blank()) +
  facet_wrap(~variable, scales = "free")
```

## Instantaneous Response

```{r}
nitrogen = 0.005
acc_0.005 = dat_0.005 %>% filter(ppfd == 1200)
dat_inst_0.005 = tibble(ppfd = seq(1,1200,length.out=50)) %>% mutate(dat = purrr::map(.x=ppfd, .f = ~rphydro_instantaneous_nitrogen(acc_0.005$vcmax25, acc_0.005$jmax25, tc, tc, .x, netrad, vpd, co2, pa, nitrogen, fapar, kphio, psi_soil, rdark, vwind, a_jmax, par_plant, par_cost, options))) %>% unnest_wider(dat)

nitrogen = 0.02
acc_0.02 = dat_0.02 %>% filter(ppfd == 1200)
dat_inst_0.02 = tibble(ppfd = seq(1,1200,length.out=50)) %>% mutate(dat = purrr::map(.x=ppfd, .f = ~rphydro_instantaneous_nitrogen(acc_0.02$vcmax25, acc_0.02$jmax25, tc, tc, .x, netrad, vpd, co2, pa, nitrogen, fapar, kphio, psi_soil, rdark, vwind, a_jmax, par_plant, par_cost, options))) %>% unnest_wider(dat)

acc_original = dat_original %>% filter(ppfd == 1200)
dat_inst_original = tibble(ppfd = seq(1,1200,length.out=50)) %>% mutate(dat = purrr::map(.x=ppfd, .f = ~rphydro_instantaneous_numerical(acc$vcmax25, acc$jmax25, tc, tc, .x, netrad, vpd, co2, pa, fapar, kphio, psi_soil, rdark, vwind, par_plant, par_cost, options))) %>% unnest_wider(dat)

df_0.005.m.inst <- dat_inst_0.005 %>% melt("ppfd")
df_0.02.m.inst <- dat_inst_0.02 %>% melt("ppfd")
df_original.m.inst <- dat_inst_original %>% melt("ppfd")

ggplot() + 
  geom_line(data = df_original.m.inst, aes(y = value, x = ppfd, color = "Numeric")) +
  geom_line(data = df_0.005.m.inst, aes(y = value, x = ppfd, color = "N Included 0.5%")) +
  geom_line(data = df_0.02.m.inst, aes(y = value, x = ppfd, color = "N Included 2%")) +
  scale_color_manual(values = c("N Included 2%" = "blue", "N Included 0.5%" = "aquamarine4", "Numeric" = "red")) +
  theme_classic() +
  theme(strip.background = element_rect(color = "white", size = 1),
        legend.title = element_blank()) +
  facet_wrap(~variable, scales = "free")
```

### J Behaviour

```{r}
J_n_0.005 = tibble(ppfd = seq(0,1200, length.out=50)) %>% 
  mutate(J = kphio*ppfd/sqrt(1+(4*kphio*ppfd/(acc_0.005$n_leaf * a_jmax))^2))

J_n_0.02 = tibble(ppfd = seq(0,1200, length.out=50)) %>% 
  mutate(J = kphio*ppfd/sqrt(1+(4*kphio*ppfd/(acc_0.02$n_leaf * a_jmax))^2))

J_original = tibble(ppfd = seq(0,1200, length.out=50)) %>% 
  mutate(J = kphio*ppfd/sqrt(1+(4*kphio*ppfd/(acc_original$jmax))^2))

ggplot()+
  geom_line(data = J_n_0.02, aes(x=ppfd, y=J), color = "blue") +
  geom_line(data = J_n_0.005, aes(x=ppfd, y=J), color = "aquamarine4") +
  geom_line(data = J_original, aes(x=ppfd, y=J), color = "red") +
  scale_color_manual(values = c("N Included 2%" = "blue", "N Included 0.5%" = "aquamarine4", "Numeric" = "red")) +
  labs(x = "PPFD (μmol m^-2 s^-1)", y = "J (μmol m^-2 s^-1)", 
       title = "Electron Transport Rate (J) vs. PPFD")

```

### Nitrogen response

This has a 50% nitrogen content which is waaay too much - need to have better values here!

```{r}
ppfd = 1200
dat_nitrogen = tibble(nitrogen = seq(0.001,0.02,length.out=50)) %>% mutate(dat = purrr::map(.x = nitrogen, .f = ~rphydro_nitrogen(tc, tc, ppfd, netrad, vpd, co2, pa, .x, fapar, kphio, psi_soil, rdark, vwind, a_jmax, par_plant, par_cost, options))) %>% unnest_wider(dat)
```

```{r}
df_nitrogen.m <- dat_nitrogen %>% melt("nitrogen")

ggplot(df_nitrogen.m, aes(y=value, x=nitrogen)) + 
  geom_line(col="aquamarine4") + 
  theme_classic() +
  theme(strip.background = element_rect(color = "white", size = 1))+
  facet_wrap(~variable, scales = "free")
```

### Testing parameters

```{r}
nitrogen = 0.02

dat_a_jmax = tibble(a_jmax = seq(60,800,length.out=50)) %>% mutate(dat = purrr::map(.x = a_jmax, .f = ~rphydro_nitrogen(tc, tc, ppfd, netrad, vpd, co2, pa, nitrogen, fapar, kphio, psi_soil, rdark, vwind, .x, par_plant, par_cost, options))) %>% unnest_wider(dat)

dat_carb_allocation = tibble(carb_allocation = seq(0.01,1,length.out=50)) %>% mutate(dat = purrr::map(.x = carb_allocation, .f = ~rphydro_nitrogen(tc, tc, ppfd, netrad, vpd, co2, pa, nitrogen, fapar, kphio, psi_soil, rdark, vwind, a_jmax, par_plant, list(alpha=0.1, gamma=1, carbon_allocation = .x), options))) %>% unnest_wider(dat)

dat_alpha = tibble(alpha = seq(0.01,0.2,length.out=50)) %>% mutate(dat = purrr::map(.x = alpha, .f = ~rphydro_nitrogen(tc, tc, ppfd, netrad, vpd, co2, pa, nitrogen, fapar, kphio, psi_soil, rdark, vwind, nitrogen, par_plant, list(alpha=.x, gamma=1, carbon_allocation = 1), options))) %>% unnest_wider(dat)
```

```{r}
df_ajmax <- dat_a_jmax %>% melt("a_jmax")
df_carb_allocation <- dat_carb_allocation %>% melt("carb_allocation")
df_alpha <- dat_alpha <- dat_alpha %>% melt("alpha")

ggplot(df_ajmax, aes(y=value, x=a_jmax)) + 
  geom_line(col="aquamarine4") + 
  theme_classic() +
  theme(strip.background = element_rect(color = "white", size = 1))+
  facet_wrap(~variable, scales = "free")
```
```{r}
ggplot(df_carb_allocation, aes(y=value, x=carb_allocation)) + 
  geom_line(col="aquamarine4") + 
  theme_classic() +
  theme(strip.background = element_rect(color = "white", size = 1))+
  facet_wrap(~variable, scales = "free")
```

```{r}
ggplot(df_alpha, aes(y=value, x=alpha)) + 
  geom_line(col="aquamarine4") + 
  theme_classic() +
  theme(strip.background = element_rect(color = "white", size = 1))+
  facet_wrap(~variable, scales = "free")
```
